title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 26.7 - Reporting of actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 26.7 - Reporting of actions

State Regulations

An adjuster shall report to the superintendent any administrative action taken against the adjuster in another jurisdiction or by another governmental agency in this State within 30 days of the final disposition of the matter, including decertification or other action related to the adjuster's proficiency to adjust multi-peril crop insurance claims. The report shall include a copy of the order, consent to order and any other relevant legal documents. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
